content: 100% premium acrylic 340yds/100g wool of the andes sport 100% peruvian highland wool 137yds/50g upcycle alpaca blend sport 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic 273yds/100g galileo 50% merino wool 50% viscose from bamboo 131yds/50g **sizing ** xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest 32 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 actual measurements are in the schematic finished measurements 35 37 40 44 47 52 55 59 62 ease this crochet sweater is meant to be a fitted design **abbreviations** blo - back loop only chain - chain pm - place marker ssc - split single_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es **gauge ** 17 sts and 18 row = 4 by 4 in single_crochet not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 11 **skill level **
